value:
$WmMPID_水着カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Swim18,Face|This is our final battle. Once it's over,
we'll be freed from the contract.$k$p$WmMPID_水着リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_F_Swim18,Face|I'll just have to do my best despite
being without my usual outfit.$k$p$WmMPID_水着チキ,ch01_10_Tiki_F_Swim18,Face|And when we're done, we all get to
finally play in the ocean! Right?$k$p$WmMPID_水着タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Swim18,Face|That's exactly right, Tiki. I am not
leaving before a nice, long swim!
Now, let's move out!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_水着リンダ,ch01_07_Rinda_F_Swim18,Face|Your strength has been
demonstrated. Thank you! I'd be glad
to help you the next time we meet.$k$pAlthough, my battle effectiveness may
vary depending on my attire...$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|OK, everyone, it's time to see your
hard work! Where are those
drawings?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, me first! Take a look! Pretty good,
right?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I like your spirit, Sharena! Now let's
take...a...look...$k$p$EFace_Pain|Are you serious? This is a joke, right?
A child could scribble better! And did
you give the sun a smiley face?!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hey, hurtful! And I happen to think my
sun is very cute! Anyway, it's not like
your drawing is any better.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Hey, I'm the big-idea person. I've got
business sense, not artistic sense!
OK, Alfonse, you're up. Let's see it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Oh, I wouldn't get my hopes up if I
were you... I hardly had time to finish
the cross-hatching.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Let Sharena: Art Critic be the judge of
that.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Whoa! Alfonse, this is good! I should
have known you'd be great at this,
too.$k$p$EFace_Cool2|But... It's sort of... How can I put this...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It's boring! There's absolutely nothing
alluring about this drawing!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Well, I wouldn't put it so bluntly, but...
She's right. Sorry, Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Well, I told you not to get your hopes
up.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This is bad, guys... Really bad. I'm
starting to see a real pattern here
with us.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Wait! I almost forgot about our savior!
Show us what you've got,
$Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, of course! You're probably a
master artist back in your home world,
right, $Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|A skilled summoner and a skilled
artist! We really hit the jackpot with
you!$k$pOh, my hopes are up so high right
now... Show me what you've got!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Even if it's a great drawing, that will
leave us with exactly one drawing to
sell...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|We'll reproduce it as many times as
we need! We have a whole army of
Heroes working for us!$k$pSo, quit stalling and show us already!$k$p$EFace_Cool|*gasp*
This... This is...$k$p$Sbs150|
